title: Video Editor
job_overview:
Are you a creative video editor with a knack for turning ideas into engaging short-form videos? We’re looking for a Video Editor who specializes in explainer-style content using stock footage and/or animated elements only – no B-roll required!

What You'll Be Doing:
Editing short-form videos (30 sec to 3 mins) for social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, etc.)

Using stock footage and animated visuals to create clean, compelling explainer videos

Syncing voiceovers and captions seamlessly

Applying engaging transitions, effects, text overlays, and sound design

Collaborating with our team to understand the messaging and bring it to life visually

Requirements:
Proven experience creating explainer or short-form content using stock footage or animation

Proficiency in editing tools like Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, or similar

Strong storytelling and pacing skills

Understanding of social media trends and audience engagement

Excellent attention to detail and fast turnaround times
